link_id.description: The replication link ID to be retrieved.

api_version.description: The API version to use for the request.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

database_name.description: The name of the database to get the link for.

location.description: Location of the server that contains this firewall rule.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
